title: Carragher ´surprised´ by Alexander-Arnold´s Anfield reception against Arsenal
description: Jamie Carragher said he was “surprised” by how many boos were heard when Trent Alexander-Arnold came on during Liverpool’s 2-2 draw with Arsenal on Sunday. Earlier this week, Alexander-Arnold confirmed he would be leaving the club at the end of the season, with a move to Real Madrid expected to be confirmed in the summer. […] The post Carragher ´surprised´ by Alexander-Arnold´s Anfield reception against Arsenal appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
